_header: In the city called Assisi / Vir trahens tunc originem
Subjects: Francis of Assisi, saint; hymns, to saints
_description: James Ryman, A macaronic song in praise of St. Francis — eleven 6-line stanzas (ababcc) with two-line refrain: ‘Whoys Ioy shalle euer encres / His name is callid ffraunces’

CULEe112.First Lines:
In the cite callyd assyseVir trahens tunc
                    originem…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Whoys ioy shalle euer encresHis name is callid
                    ffraunces
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 316-18.
